column4: I am installing nvidia gelato, and it says i need to set the envirnment variable GELATOHOME="/opt/nvidia/gelato"  -- but if i do sudo gedit /etc/ld.so.conf and add it i get the error: sudo ldconfig
/sbin/ldconfig.real: "/opt/nvidia/gelato" is not a known library type  -- what am i doing wrong?
ld.so.conf is NOT where you put environment variables
